passages.text:
You’re <emphasis level="moderate">finally in France</emphasis>, you were dreaming about this trip <emphasis level="moderate">for years</emphasis>.
You rent a car and you're gonna visit the Versailles castle.

<break time="0.5s"/>

As you’re taking a small country road, the car makes weird noises, and suddenly, the car shuts off! You try to start it again, but the car sputters out. <say-as interpret-as="interjection">uh oh!</say-as>
You start walking.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/human/amzn_sfx_human_walking_01.mp3'/>

A couple of miles later, you're in a forest, it's dark and you’re getting cold.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_strong_wind_desert_01.mp3'/>
You notice a <emphasis level="moderate">large dwelling</emphasis> with a <prosody pitch="low">haunted look</prosody>.

Say [[get closer|The outside of the castle]] to continue.

links.name: get closer|The outside of the castle
links.link: get closer|The outside of the castle

passages.name: Arrived in France

passages.text:
Okay, let's go to the garage.
Or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/le_garage_femme.mp3'/> in French.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_wooden_door_creaks_long_01.mp3'/>
It's dark. You try to turn on the light, but it's not working.
You see a little elevator door. You press on the button, but it won't work without electricity.

What do you want to do?
You can say [[look right|The shelf in the garage]], or, [[look left|The electrical panel in the garage]]

links.name: look right|The shelf in the garage
links.link: look right|The shelf in the garage

links.name: look left|The electrical panel in the garage
links.link: look left|The electrical panel in the garage

passages.name: Garage

passages.text:
"Okay! Let’s go to the living room. Or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/le_salon_femme.mp3'/> in French.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_wooden_door_creaks_long_01.mp3'/>
Inside, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/le_salon_femme.mp3'/>
you see: a locked cabinet. 
You try to open it, but it won't open without a key.
What do you want to do? 
You can say [[look right|The desk in the living room]], or, [[look left|The sofa in the living room]].

links.name: look right|The desk in the living room
links.link: look right|The desk in the living room

links.name: look left|The sofa in the living room
links.link: look left|The sofa in the living room

passages.name: Living room

passages.text:
Okay, let's go to the terrace, or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/la_terrasse_femme.mp3'/>, in French.
You enter <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/la_terrasse_femme.mp3'/> and everything is <emphasis level="moderate">colored black.</emphasis>
You see: <emphasis level="moderate">a hatch on the ground</emphasis>, that needs a key to be opened.
You can say, [[look right|The table and chairs in the terrace]], or, [[look left|The strongbox in the terrace]].

links.name: look right|The table and chairs in the terrace
links.link: look right|The table and chairs in the terrace

links.name: look left|The strongbox in the terrace
links.link: look left|The strongbox in the terrace

passages.name: Terrace

passages.text:
On the left, there is a nice sofa. Between the cushions, you see a small box.
Say [[look at box|The box in the living room]], to look closer.

links.name: look at box|The box in the living room
links.link: look at box|The box in the living room

passages.name: The sofa in the living room

passages.text:
On the right, you see an artisanal desk made of cedar wood, with an old computer, and a pile of dusty documents.
Do you want to  [[look at documents|The documents in the living room]]? Or [[look at computer|The computer in living the room]]?

links.name: look at documents|The documents in the living room
links.link: look at documents|The documents in the living room

links.name: look at computer|The computer in living the room
links.link: look at computer|The computer in living the room

passages.name: The desk in the living room

passages.text:
On the top right corner of the document <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/> you can see three round stickers: 
<prosody rate="slow">a blue one, a grey one, and an orange one.</prosody> Below them, it's written: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bleu_gris_orange_femme.mp3'/> 

So that must means, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bleu_femme.mp3'/> is, blue. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gris_femme.mp3'/> is, grey. And <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/orange_femme.mp3'/> is, orange.

Now, you can say [[look at computer|The computer in living the room]].

links.name: look at computer|The computer in living the room
links.link: look at computer|The computer in living the room

passages.name: The documents in the living room

passages.text:
On the box, you see a combination lock in the form of a compass. You need to turn the compass three times in the correct directions between:
North <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/nord_femme.mp3'/> East <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/est_femme.mp3'/> South <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_femme.mp3'/> Or, West <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/ouest_femme.mp3'/> 

You can say [[enter code|First code of the box in the living room]] to try a code.
Otherwise, if you didn't see any clue yet, say [[look right|The desk in the living room]].

links.name: enter code|First code of the box in the living room
links.link: enter code|First code of the box in the living room

links.name: look right|The desk in the living room
links.link: look right|The desk in the living room

passages.text:
What is the first direction?

Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/nord_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/est_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_femme.mp3'/>

You can say: [[nord|Second code of the box in the living room]], [[este|Second code of the box in the living room]], or, [[seud|The second code of the box in the living room]]

links.link: nord|Second code of the box in the living room

Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/nord_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/est_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_femme.mp3'/>

You can say: [[nord|Third code of the box in the living room]], or, [[este|The third code of the box in the living room]], or, [[seud|Third code of the box in the living room]]

Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/nord_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/est_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_femme.mp3'/>

You can say: [[nord|The opened box in the living room]], or, [[este|The closed box in the living room]], or, [[seud|The closed box in the living room]]

passages.text:
<say-as interpret-as="interjection">Well done!</say-as>
The box opens and you see a key inside. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_femme.mp3'/> is so happy, he yells: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/la_cle_the_key_you_found_it.mp3'/> You go forward and open the door. 

Behind the door, you find a clock asleep in a small bed. Thanks to you the clock named <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/horloge_femme.mp3'/> is free. She is really glad you saved her, she tells you: thank you.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/merci_femme.mp3'/>

Say [[merci|The living room is unlocked]], back to her.

links.name: merci|The living room is unlocked
links.link: merci|The living room is unlocked

The box won't open because the code is not correct. 

Do you want to [[try again|First code of the box in the living room again]]? Or, if you didn't find a clue yet say: look [[right|The desk in the living room]]

Say [[enter code|First code of the computer in living the room]] to try a code. Or, if you didn't see any clue yet, you can [[look at documents|The documents in the living room]].

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/oui_int.mp3'/>
The code was correct.
On the screen, you see a compass, with the directions:
North. East. South. West. 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/nord_est_sud_ouest_femme.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
Under it,  it’s written:
<prosody rate="slow">South. East. North.</prosody>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_est_nord_femme.mp3'/>
Now, you can say: [[look left|The sofa in the living room]].

passages.text:

You go to the entrance of the castle. You can either press the [[doorbell|Doorbell]], or read the [[sign|Sign]] next to the door.
What do you want to do?

links.link: doorbell|Doorbell

links.name: sign|Sign
links.link: sign|Sign

passages.name: The outside of the castle

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/home/amzn_sfx_doorbell_01.mp3'/>
It asks you for the password. If you didn't see the sign next to the door, that tell you the password, you can just guess.
Say [[one|the entrance of the castle]], for:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonjour_intj.mp3'/>
Or [[two|The gateway of the castle]], for:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/merci_intj.mp3'/>
You can say: one, or, two.

links.name: one|the entrance of the castle
links.link: one|the entrance of the castle

links.name: two|The gateway of the castle
links.link: two|The gateway of the castle

passages.name: Doorbell

passages.text:
The sign next to the door says: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonjour_intj.mp3'/>

Now, you can say press [[doorbell|Doorbell]].

links.name: doorbell|Doorbell
links.link: doorbell|Doorbell

passages.name: Sign

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/magic/amzn_sfx_magic_blast_1x_01.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/home/amzn_sfx_door_open_03.mp3'/>

You enter and see a <emphasis level="moderate">magnificent</emphasis> hall, with nice paintings on the walls, and a spiral staircase on the left.
This castle seems empty.
<emphasis level="moderate">Unexpectedly</emphasis>, you hear <emphasis level="moderate">a voice.</emphasis>

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonjour_homme.mp3'/> You interrupt the voice and explain that you don’t speak French.
<emphasis level="moderate">A living light</emphasis> approaches and says: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/I_shoudnt_say_bjr_I_should_say_hello.mp3'/>

Say [[bonjour|Inside the castle]], to continue.

links.name: bonjour|Inside the castle
links.link: bonjour|Inside the castle

passages.text:
<say-as interpret-as="interjection">Wah wah!</say-as>
The door doesn't open because the password wasn't correct. 
Say: look at [[sign|Sign next to the door]], to see what's written on it.

links.link: sign|Sign next to the door

Where do you want to go? You can say: the [[Garage]], the [[Terrace]], or, the [[Living room]].

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/my_name_is_lumiere_it_means_light_in_french.mp3'/>
And he tells you
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/enchante_homme.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/this_means_nice_to_meet_you.mp3'/>

Say: [[Enchanté|entryway]], to <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_homme.mp3'/> to continue.

links.link: Enchanté|entryway

passages.name: Inside the castle

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/super_intj.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/you_unlocked_the_living_room_and_you_fried_the_clock.mp3'/>
For the full experience, you can meet us on the website. You will be able to speak with <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/horloge_femme.mp3'/> and discover more of the castle.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
The website keyword of the living room is, the name of the clock: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/horloge_femme.mp3'/>
<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">h</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">o</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">r</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">l</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">o</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">g</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">e</say-as></prosody>.

Say: stop, to stop playing for now, and, save your progress.
You can also say: [[continue]], to unlock doors.
There are three rooms with prisoners in the ground floor.

links.link: continue

passages.name: back to the ground floor

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/je_mappelle_horloge_femme.mp3'/>
My name is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/horloge_femme.mp3'/>
It means: clock, in French.
And the clock tells you: nice to meet you!
Say: nice to meet you in french. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/enchante_femme.mp3'/> 
Say [[enchanté|back to the ground floor]].

links.link: enchanté|back to the ground floor

passages.name: The living room is unlocked

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bravo_intj.mp3'/>
<prosody rate="slow">Nice French accent already</prosody>!
The light tells you that this used to be a <emphasis level="moderate">wonderful castle</emphasis>,<prosody rate="slow"> but now.</prosody>It’s bewitched! And the inhabitants were all turned into objects and are sealed inside rooms.
<emphasis level="moderate">The only way to free them</emphasis>, is to unlock the doors by solving the mystery in each room.

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/do_you_want_to_help_us.mp3'/>
Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/oui_femme.mp3'/> for yes. Or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/non_femme.mp3'/> for no.

You can say [[oui|ground floor]] or [[no|cellar]].

links.name: oui|ground floor
links.link: oui|ground floor

links.name: no|cellar
links.link: no|cellar

passages.name: entryway

passages.text:
<say-as interpret-as="interjection">all righty!</say-as>
<say-as interpret-as="interjection">just kidding!</say-as>
The thing is, the spell has already fallen against you. So you're gonna have to help them to be free.
Say [[oui|ground floor]] to continue.

links.link: oui|ground floor

You already tried the password <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/merci_intj.mp3'/> by saying: two.
Now, say: [[one|the entrance of the castle]], for:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonjour_intj.mp3'/>

So that must means, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bleu_femme.mp3'/> is, blue.

Say: [[bleu|Bleu is the first code of the computer]], to enter the color blue, in the computer.

You look at the directions again.
They are: <prosody rate="slow">South. East. North.</prosody> Under, it's written: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_est_nord_femme.mp3'/>

So that must means, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sud_femme.mp3'/> is, South.

Say: [[seud|Sud is the first direction of the box]], to enter South, in the box.

passages.text:
On the right, you see a big shelf. 
At the top of the shelf, there are some books.
And at the bottom, you see an old dusty box.

You can say [[look at books|The books in the garage]], or [[look at the box|The box in the garage]].

links.name: look at books|The books in the garage
links.link: look at books|The books in the garage

links.name: look at the box|The box in the garage
links.link: look at the box|The box in the garage

passages.name: The shelf in the garage

passages.text:
On the left, you see: an electrical panel.
You need to enter a number code to have access to the panel.
You can say [[enter code|First code of the electrical panel access]].
Otherwise, if you didn't find a number clue yet, say [[look right|The shelf in the garage]]

links.name: enter code|First code of the electrical panel access
links.link: enter code|First code of the electrical panel access

links.name: look right|The shelf in the garage
links.link: look right|The shelf in the garage

passages.name: The electrical panel in the garage

passages.text:
You open one of the books. 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
There is a picture of an electrical panel. And underneath, you see the numbers: <prosody rate="slow">one, two, three.</prosody>

Under one, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/un_femme.mp3'/>
Under two, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/deux_femme.mp3'/>
Under three, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/trois_femme.mp3'/>

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/un_deux_trois_femme.mp3'/>

<prosody rate="x-slow">Say: [[un deux trois|The book in the garage]],</prosody> to continue.

links.name: un deux trois|The book in the garage
links.link: un deux trois|The book in the garage

passages.name: The books in the garage

passages.text:
Looking at the box
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
You see: three paint cans. 
A purple one, a pink one, and a yellow one.

On the purple one, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/violet_femme.mp3'/>
So that means: purple, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/violet_femme.mp3'/>
Say: [[veeolet|The purple can in the garage]], to continue.

links.name: veeolet|The purple can in the garage
links.link: veeolet|The purple can in the garage

passages.text:
To have access to the electrical panel, you need to press the numbers in the correct order between <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/un_deux_trois_femme.mp3'/>

What is the first number you want to press?
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/un_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/deux_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/trois_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[un|Second code of the electrical panel access]], [[deux|The second code of the electrical panel access]], or, [[trois|The second code of the electrical panel access]].

You can say: [[try again|First code of the electrical panel access again]], or: look [[at shelf|The shelf in the garage]] if you didn't find a clue yet.

passages.name: The closed access of the electrical panel

passages.text:
Nice, the code was correct!
You now have access to the electrical panel.
You see: three electric wires. 
A purple one, a pink one, and a yellow one.
And you see: three power sockets.
<break time="0.5s"/>
Under each socket, is written a color. 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/violet_rose_jaune_femme.mp3'/>
You remember that purple, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/violet_femme.mp3'/> Pink, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/rose_femme.mp3'/> And yellow, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/jaune_femme.mp3'/>

You're going to have to plug the wires, into the correct socket.
Are you ready? Say: [[oui|Plug the purple wire]], to start.

links.name: oui|Plug the purple wire
links.link: oui|Plug the purple wire

passages.text:
Where do you want to plug the purple wire?
Do you want to plug it at the socket named <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/violet_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/rose_femme.mp3'/>, or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/jaune_femme.mp3'/>

<say-as interpret-as="interjection">Well done!</say-as>
The light comes on.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/office/amzn_sfx_elevator_bell_1x_01.mp3'/>
The elevator door opens and you see: a living cup.
Thanks to you, the cup named: Tasse, is free. 
She is really glad you saved her, she tells you: thank you.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/merci_femme.mp3'/>

I am: Tasse.

It means: cup, in French.
And the cup tells you: nice to meet you!
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/enchante_femme.mp3'/>

The cup would love to continue speaking with you but she can't wait to see <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_femme.mp3'/> again.
She tells you: sorry.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/pardon_femme.mp3'/>
And also, she tells you: goodbye
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/au_revoir_femme.mp3'/>

Say, [[au revoir|To the ground floor again]], to Tasse.

For the full experience, you can meet us on the website. You will be able to speak with: Tasse. And discover more of the castle.

The website keyword of the garage is, the name of the cup: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/tasse_femme.mp3'/>
<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">t</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">a</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">s</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">s</say-as></prosody>,<prosody rate="x-slow"><say-as interpret-as="spell-out">e</say-as></prosody>.

You can also say: [[continue]], to unlock other doors. There are three rooms with prisoners in the ground floor.

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bravo_intj.mp3'/>
The Second Floor will be available soon.

By the meantime, you can review everything you learned in French. Go to the website and enter password: ground floor.

Don't hesitate to tell us what you think about the game: Trapped in France.
We'd like to be very careful to please our players.

passages.text:
Looking right, you see: a low table with two lounge chairs.
You can say: [[look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace]], or, [[look at table|The table in the terrace]].

links.name: look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace
links.link: look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace

links.name: look at table|The table in the terrace
links.link: look at table|The table in the terrace

passages.name: The table and chairs in the terrace

passages.text:
Looking left, you see a safe, with three arrows. You can turn the direction of the arrows of in order to open the safe. 

To try to open it, you can say: [[turn arrows|First direction of the arrows in the terrace]].
Otherwise, if you didn't find a clue yet, about direction, say: [[look right|The table and chairs in the terrace]].

links.name: turn arrows|First direction of the arrows in the terrace
links.link: turn arrows|First direction of the arrows in the terrace

links.name: look right|The table and chairs in the terrace
links.link: look right|The table and chairs in the terrace

passages.name: The strongbox in the terrace

passages.text:
Behind the chairs, you see a lot of planted roses. It's only black roses. Next to the roses, you see a sign with <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/noir_femme.mp3'/> written on it.
So, that must mean, black, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/noir_femme.mp3'/>

In the middle of the black roses: is a small white rose.
Next to the white rose, there is a sign with <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/blanc_femme.mp3'/> written on it.
So that must mean, white, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/blanc_femme.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
It looks like the black roses are winning.

Now, you can [[look at table|The table in the terrace]].

links.name: look at table|The table in the terrace
links.link: look at table|The table in the terrace

passages.name: The chairs in the terrace

passages.text:
On the table, you see: a chess board.
You have to play, with the correct colored pieces, to win.
If you know which color you are going to pick to win, say, [[play chess|The chess board in the terrace]].
Otherwise, if you didn't find a clue yet, about what must be the dominant color in the terrace, you can say: [[look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace]].

links.name: play chess|The chess board in the terrace
links.link: play chess|The chess board in the terrace

links.name: look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace
links.link: look at chairs|The chairs in the terrace

passages.name: The table in the terrace

passages.text:
You remember that, right is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/> And, left is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>

What is the direction you want to turn the first arrow?
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>
You can say: [[droite|Second direction of the arrows in the terrace]], or, [[gauche|The second direction of the arrows in the terrace]].

links.link: gauche|The second direction of the arrows in the terrace

passages.text:
Which color do you want to pick, to win the chess game?
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/noir_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/blanc_femme.mp3'/>

passages.name: The chess board in the terrace

passages.text:
The game begins.

Finally, you say: checkmate! And you win.

Since you won, the pieces magically take the form of three arrows.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_glasses_clink_01.mp3'/>
One pointing right, one pointing left, and another one, pointing right.

<prosody rate="slow">Right, left, right.</prosody>

Under the arrows pointing right, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>
And under the arrow pointing left, it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>

That must mean: right, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>, And left, is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>

Now, you can say: [[look left|The strongbox in the terrace]]

links.name: look left|The strongbox in the terrace
links.link: look left|The strongbox in the terrace

passages.name: The opened chess board in the terrace

passages.text:
The game begins.

But, unfortunately, you hear: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/checkmate_homme.mp3'/> And, the black color wins the game. 
You can say, [[try again|Play chess board again]].

links.name: try again|Play chess board again
links.link: try again|Play chess board again

passages.text:

Now, you can pick the color: black
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/noir_femme.mp3'/>

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/ask-soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_clock_ticking_01.mp3'/>
<say-as interpret-as="interjection">Well done!</say-as>
The safe opens. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_femme.mp3'/> looks inside, and there is the key!
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/la_cle_homme.mp3'/>
He says: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/jai_la_cle_homme.mp3'/>
It means, I have the key.

Please, ask for the key, from him.
In French, please is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sil_te_plait__slow_femme.mp3'/>
Say, [[s'il tle plaît|The opened ground hatch in the terrace]]

links.link: s'il tle plaît|The opened ground hatch in the terrace

You can say: [[try again|First direction of the arrows in the terrace again]], or: look [[right|The table and chairs in the terrace]].

Inside, you see: <emphasis level="moderate">a living cabinet.</emphasis>
Thanks to you, the cabinet named <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/armoire_femme.mp3'/> is free.

She tells you: good evening.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonsoir_femme.mp3'/>

My name is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/armoire_femme.mp3'/>
it means: cabinet, in French.
She is really glad you saved her, and she tells you: thank you so much.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/merci_beaucoup_femme.mp3'/>

Say, [[merci beaucoup|Back to the ground floor again]], back to her.

<say-as interpret-as="interjection">Well done!</say-as>
The safe opens. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_femme.mp3'/> looks inside, and there is the key!
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/la_cle_femme.mp3'/>
He says: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/jai_la_cle_homme.mp3'/>
It means, I have the key.

You want to ask for the key from <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/lumiere_femme.mp3'/> to open the hatch.
Say, please, to him, it's <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/sil_te_plait__slow_femme.mp3'/>
Say, [[s'il tle plaît|The opened ground hatch in the terrace]]

links.name: s'il tle plaît|The opened ground hatch in the terrace
links.link: s'il tle plaît|The opened ground hatch in the terrace

passages.name: Droite is the thrid direction of the strongbox

passages.text:
The sign next to the door says: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/bonjour_intj.mp3'/>

Now, you can say press [[doorbell|Doorbell again]].

links.name: doorbell|Doorbell again
links.link: doorbell|Doorbell again

passages.name: Sign next to the door

passages.text:
You go up the spiral staircase, but, a big painting is blocking the entrance and asks you for the password. 
You can either look at the [[sign|The sign of the painting]], next to the painting. Or, [[ask Lumiere|Asking Lumiere the password]] for the password. What to you want to do?

links.name: sign|The sign of the painting
links.link: sign|The sign of the painting

links.name: ask Lumiere|Asking Lumiere the password
links.link: ask Lumiere|Asking Lumiere the password

passages.name: Second floor

passages.text:
You look at the sign, and you see: a drawing of a castle. 
Under it, is written: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/chateau_femme.mp3'/> 

So <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/chateau_femme.mp3'/> must mean: castle, in French.
Now, you can say, [[enter password|The password of the painting]].

links.name: enter password|The password of the painting
links.link: enter password|The password of the painting

passages.name: The sign of the painting

passages.text:
You find Lumière in "LE SALON.MP3" and ask him what the password is.
(Lumiere voice:) Ah oui the painting is protecting the way. The password is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/chateau_femme.mp3'/> That means castle in French.
Now, you can say: [[enter password|The password of the painting]]

links.name: enter password|The password of the painting
links.link: enter password|The password of the painting

passages.name: Asking Lumiere the password

passages.text:
In order to give the password, you need, to press on the correct part of the painting. 
You see a castle, and, a house.
What do you want to press?
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/chateau_femme.mp3'/> or <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/la_maison_femme.mp3'/>
You can say, [[chateau|The painting opens]], or, [[maison|The painting doesn't opens]]

links.name: chateau|The painting opens
links.link: chateau|The painting opens

links.name: maison|The painting doesn't opens
links.link: maison|The painting doesn't opens

passages.name: The password of the painting

passages.text:
Bravo
You enter the second floor. 
The painting tells you <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/bonjour_je_mappelle_tableau_homme.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/tableau_femme.mp3'/> means: painting, in French.
And, he asks you <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/comment_tu_tappelles_homme.mp3'/> Which means, what's your name. 
Tell him your name, by starting with: [[je m'appelle|Entrance of the first floor]]

links.name: je m'appelle|Entrance of the first floor
links.link: je m'appelle|Entrance of the first floor

passages.name: The painting opens

passages.text:
The painting won't open because the password is not "la maison".
You are not in a house but in a castle!
Now, say [[chateau|The painting opens]] to press on the castle and open the door.

links.name: chateau|The painting opens
links.link: chateau|The painting opens

passages.name: The painting doesn't opens

passages.text:
That's a nice name!
And <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/tableau_femme.mp3'/> tells you
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/comment_ca_va_homme.mp3'/> Which means: How are you?
Tell him; fine <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/ca_va_femme.mp3'/> , good / <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/bien_femme.mp3'/>, or very good <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/tres_bien_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[ça va|ca va]], [[bien|bien]], or, [[très bien|tres bien]].

links.name: ça va|ca va
links.link: ça va|ca va

links.name: bien|bien
links.link: bien|bien

links.name: très bien|tres bien
links.link: très bien|tres bien

passages.name: Entrance of the first floor

passages.text:
Now, ask: Tableau, how he is doing! Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/et_toi_femme.mp3'/> which means: and you? 
you can say [[Et toi|et toi]]?

links.name: Et toi|et toi
links.link: Et toi|et toi

passages.name: ca va

passages.text:
Now, ask: Tableau, how he is doing! Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/et_toi_femme.mp3'/> which means: and you? 
you can say [[Et toi|et toi]]?

links.name: Et toi|et toi
links.link: Et toi|et toi

passages.name: bien

passages.text:
Now, ask: Tableau, how he is doing! Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/et_toi_femme.mp3'/> which means: and you? 
you can say [[Et toi|et toi]]?

links.name: Et toi|et toi
links.link: Et toi|et toi

passages.name: tres bien

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/ca_va_tres_bien_merci_homme.mp3'/>
And he asks you if you are the one who saved <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/le_rez_de_chaussee_homme.mp3'/> 
Which means "the ground floor". You explain that you did save it and that you're actually here to go unlock more doors! 

Okay, there are three rooms on the first floor. There is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/la_chambre_femme.mp3'/> the bedroom, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/la_cuisine_femme.mp3'/> the kitchen and <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/le_balcon_femme.mp3'/>, the balcony. 
Where do you want to go? You can say the [[bedroom|Bedroom]], the [[kitchen|Kitchen]] or the [[balcony|Balcony]].

links.name: bedroom|Bedroom
links.link: bedroom|Bedroom

links.name: kitchen|Kitchen
links.link: kitchen|Kitchen

links.name: balcony|Balcony
links.link: balcony|Balcony

passages.name: et toi

passages.text:
Okay, let's go to the bedroom, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/la_chambre_femme.mp3'/> in French.
The bedroom is big, and very well arranged.
You can look left <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>, or, right <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>, 
You can say: [[gauche|Nightstand of the bedroom]] or [[droite|Bookcase of the bedroom]].

links.name: gauche|Nightstand of the bedroom
links.link: gauche|Nightstand of the bedroom

links.name: droite|Bookcase of the bedroom
links.link: droite|Bookcase of the bedroom

passages.name: Bedroom

passages.text:
Okay, let's go to the kitchen, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/la_cuisine_femme.mp3'/> in French.
It's a very big kitchen but a little bit messy.
You see a small door at the end of the kitchen. It is locked.
You can look left <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>, or, right <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[gauche|Counter of the kitchen]], or, [[droite|Fridge of the kitchen]]

links.name: gauche|Counter of the kitchen
links.link: gauche|Counter of the kitchen

links.name: droite|Fridge of the kitchen
links.link: droite|Fridge of the kitchen

passages.name: Kitchen

passages.text:
Okay, let's go to the balcony, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/le_balcon_femme.mp3'/> in French.
On the side of the balcony, you see a locked door that needs a key. 
What do you want to do?
You can say left <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/gauche_femme.mp3'/>, or, right <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[gauche|The magazine of the balcony]] or [[droite|The table of the balcony]]

links.name: gauche|The magazine of the balcony
links.link: gauche|The magazine of the balcony

links.name: droite|The table of the balcony
links.link: droite|The table of the balcony

passages.name: Balcony

passages.text:
On the left, you see a nightstand with two drawers. Do you want to look in the top or bottom drawer? 
Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/en_haut_femme.mp3'/>, for the top drawer and <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/en_bas_femme.mp3'/>, for the bottom drawer.
You can say [[en haut| At the top of the nightstand]] or [[en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand]]

links.name: en haut| At the top of the nightstand
links.link: en haut| At the top of the nightstand

links.name: en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand
links.link: en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand

passages.name: Nightstand of the bedroom

passages.text:
On the right, you see a bookcase with a lot of french books. One is bigger than the others. It looks like a magic book and you need to say a spell to open it. The spell contains the days of the week. If you are ready, say: open in French, it's <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/ouvrir_femme.mp3'/> to try to open the book. Otherwise, if you didn't see any clues about days of the week say look <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/myadventurezlatoupan/droite_femme.mp3'/>
You can say: [[ouvrir|Code of the electrical book of the bookcase]], or, [[droite|Nightstand of the bedroom]].

links.name: ouvrir|Code of the electrical book of the bookcase
links.link: ouvrir|Code of the electrical book of the bookcase

links.name: droite|Nightstand of the bedroom
links.link: droite|Nightstand of the bedroom

passages.name: Bookcase of the bedroom

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/en_haut_femme.mp3'/> you see a map of the castle.
You see the first floor, the second floor and the third floor. 
Under it, it's written:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/premier_femme.mp3'/>, which means first.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/deuxieme_femme.mp3'/>, which means second.
and <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/troisieme_femme.mp3'/> wich means third. 
 
Now look at the bottom by saying [[en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand]].
Otherwise say look [[left|Bookcase of the bedroom]].

links.name: en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand
links.link: en bas|At the bottom of the nightstand

links.name: left|Bookcase of the bedroom
links.link: left|Bookcase of the bedroom

passages.name: At the top of the nightstand

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/en_bas_femme.mp3'/>, you see a Calendar.
In France, the Calendar starts on Monday.
You read <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mardi_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
So that must mean Monday is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_femme.mp3'/>
Say [[lundi|The calendar of the nightstand]]

links.name: lundi|The calendar of the nightstand
links.link: lundi|The calendar of the nightstand

passages.name: At the bottom of the nightstand

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_mardi_mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
So that must mean Tuesday is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mardi_femme.mp3'/>
Say [[mardi|Calendar of the nightstand]]

links.name: mardi|Calendar of the nightstand
links.link: mardi|Calendar of the nightstand

passages.name: The calendar of the nightstand

passages.text:
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_mardi_mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
So that must mean <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mercredi_femme.mp3'/> is Wednesday
Say [[mercredi|The end of the calendar of the nightstand]]

links.name: mercredi|The end of the calendar of the nightstand
links.link: mercredi|The end of the calendar of the nightstand

passages.name: Calendar of the nightstand

passages.text:
Bravo! 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_mardi_mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
Now you can say look [[en haut|At the bottom of the nightstand]].
Otherwise, you can say look [[droite|Bookcase of the bedroom]].

links.name: en haut|At the bottom of the nightstand
links.link: en haut|At the bottom of the nightstand

links.name: droite|Bookcase of the bedroom
links.link: droite|Bookcase of the bedroom

passages.name: The end of the calendar of the nightstand

passages.text:
The magic book asks what is the <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/premier_femme.mp3'/> day of the week.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/premier_femme.mp3'/> means first.
Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mardi_femme.mp3'/>, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[lundi|Second code of the electrical book]], [[mardi|The second code of the electrical book]], or, [[mercredi|The second code of the electrical book]]?

links.link: lundi|Second code of the electrical book

links.link: mercredi|The second code of the electrical book

passages.text:
What is the deuxième second day of the week?
Second means second.
Is it [[lundi|The third code of the electrical book]], [[mardi|The third code of the electrical book]], [[mercredi|The third code of the electrical book]]?

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/deuxieme_femme.mp3'/> means second.
Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mardi_femme.mp3'/>, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mercredi_femme.mp3'/>
You can say [[lundi|The third code of the electrical book]], [[mardi|Third code of the electrical book]], [[mercredi|The third code of the electrical book]]?

Troisième means third.
Is it [[lundi|The closed electrical book]], [[mardi|The closed electrical book]], [[mercredi|The closed electrical book]]?

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/troisieme_femme.mp3'/> means third.
Is it <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lundi_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mardi_femme.mp3'/>, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/mercredi_femme.mp3'/>

passages.name: The closed electrical book

passages.text:
Bravo now you see:
ding
a drawing of a girl, a cat, and a mouse in this order. To the taller to the smaller.
Under it it's written <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_fille_un_chat_une_souris_femme.mp3'/>
So that must mean: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_fille_femme.mp3'/> is a girl.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/un_chat_femme.mp3'/> is a cat and <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_souris_femme.mp3'/> is a mouse.
So the order is: a girl, a cat, a mouse.
Now you can look at the bottom of the bookcase, say [[en bas|At the bottom of the bookcase]]

links.name: en bas|At the bottom of the bookcase
links.link: en bas|At the bottom of the bookcase

passages.name: The opened electrical book

passages.text:
You see a box with figurines on the top. There is a mouse <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_souris_femme.mp3'/>, a cat <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/un_chat_femme.mp3'/> and a girl <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_fille_femme.mp3'/>
You try to open it but it won't open. You need to place the figurines in the correct order so the box will open.
First you need to take the figurines. Say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/prendre_femme.mp3'/> which is take in French.
Say [[prendre|First figurine of the box]].

links.name: prendre|First figurine of the box
links.link: prendre|First figurine of the box

passages.name: At the bottom of the bookcase

passages.text:
What is the first figurine you want to put back on the box? 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_fille_femme.mp3'/>, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/un_chat_femme.mp3'/>, or, <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_souris_femme.mp3'/> 
You can say: [[fille|Second figurine of the box]], [[chat|The second figurine of the box]], [[souris|The second figurine of the box]].

links.link: fille|Second figurine of the box

links.link: souris|The second figurine of the box

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/une_fille_un_chat_une_souris_femme.mp3'/>
You can say: [[fille|The third figurine of the box]], [[chat|Third figurine of the box]], or [[souris|The third figurine of the box]].

Une fille, un chat, un rat.

You can say [[try again]]

passages.name: The closed box of the bookcase

passages.text:
Bravo!
The box opens and you a see a very small bed inside!
The bed wakes up and is so happy to see some light!
He tells you
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/bonjour_je-mappelle_lit_homme.mp3'/>
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/lit_femme.mp3'/> means bed in French.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/je_suis_un_garcon_homme.mp3'/> Which means: I am a boy.
To say bonjour to Lit, you can say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/dire_bonjour_femme.mp3'/> which means: say hello.
Say [[dire bonjour|The bedroom is unlocked]]

links.name: dire bonjour|The bedroom is unlocked
links.link: dire bonjour|The bedroom is unlocked

passages.name: The opened box of the bookcase

passages.text: Bravo you unlocked the bedroom and you freed the bed!
passages.name: Back to the first floor

passages.text:
On the left you see a counter with a lot of documents on it. And next to it you see an oven.
Do you want to look at [[documents|The documents of the kitchen]]? Or look at the [[oven|The oven of the kitchen]]?

links.name: documents|The documents of the kitchen
links.link: documents|The documents of the kitchen

links.name: oven|The oven of the kitchen
links.link: oven|The oven of the kitchen

passages.name: Counter of the kitchen

passages.text:
On the right, you see a fridge, you open it.
Inside you see a box with a lock on it. 
If you want to start to open the box, say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/commencer_femme.mp3'/> which means start in French.
Otherwise, if you didn't see any number clue yet, you look left. 
You can say [[commencer|First code of the lock in the kitchen]] or [[gauche|Counter of the kitchen]]

And under <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/vendredi_femme.mp3'/> which means Friday, you see a picture of a dad which is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/papa_femme.mp3'/> in French. 

That must mean that on Thursday, the person sees their mom and on Friday, they see their dad. 

Now you can look at the [[oven|The oven of the kitchen]].

links.link: oven|The oven of the kitchen

You try to open the oven but it's stuck. On the oven you see a touchscreen. There is an agenda on it and you need to place the correct schedule. If you are ready say <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/commencer_femme.mp3'/>, which means start in french. 
Otherwise, if you didn't see any clue yet say look at documents
Say [[commencer|First code of the oven]] or [[documents|The documents of the kitchen]].

After having met and talked a little bit with you. 
He tells you <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/bonne_soiree_homme.mp3'/>, which means: good evening.
Say [[bonne soirée|Back to the first floor]] to Lit.

Saturday is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/samedi_femme.mp3'/> and Sunday is <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/dimanche_femme.mp3'/>

You need to turn the hands to the correct number in order to open the table. 
If you didn't see any numbers clue yet, say droite.
If you know which number you want to put, say: turn, in French it's <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/tourner_femme.mp3'/>

The code was correct. Now, in order for the table to open you need to say open in French. It's <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/ouvrir_femme.mp3'/>

passages.text:
The table opens.

Inside the table you see a male pink dog. un chien rose Chien means a male dog. 
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/il_est_rose_femme.mp3'/> that means: it is pink.

Next to the dog, you see an female orange dog. Une chienne orange. Une chienne means a female dog.
<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/elle_est_orange_femme.mp3'/> that means: it is orange.

So il means he and elle means she.

<audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/il_est_rose_femme.mp3'/> Who is the sentence about?
The male dog le chien or the female dog la chienne 
You can say [[le chien|Inside the table]] or [[la chienne|The inside of the table]]

<audio src=''/>

passages.text:
Very good!
Next to the animals, you see a tape recorder. 
You click on play and you here. 
"La chienne, elle a la clé". 
You recognize la chienne, the female dog and la clé, the key. 
You look closer at the goat and you see that it is carrying a key!

"Elle a la clé" that must mean it has the key.

Say "give" in French to the female dog so it can give you the key.
Give is: <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/donner_femme.mp3'/> in French.
Say [[donner|The door of the balcony in unlocked]]

links.name: donner|The door of the balcony in unlocked
links.link: donner|The door of the balcony in unlocked

passages.text:
Bravo, the female dog understands you and gives you the key!
You open the door and you see a chair inside. 
The chair looks at you amazed! She's so happy to see you and to be saved!
She tells you <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/bonsoir_je_mappelle_chaise_femme.mp3'/> That means chair in French. 
She tells you thank you so much and she's asking you if you can help her one last time.
Say okay in French to help her. <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/daccord_femme.mp3'/>
Say [[d'accord|The balcony is unlocked]]

links.name: d'accord|The balcony is unlocked
links.link: d'accord|The balcony is unlocked

passages.text:
She'd like for you to carry le chien the male dog and la chienne the female dog out of the table so she can play with them. 
Merci beaucoup, you are really nice!
And Chaise tells you <audio src='https://s3.amazonaws.com/trappedinf/a_demain_femme.mp3'/> it means see you tomorrow.
Say [[à demain|Back to the first floor again]] to chaise.
